title: Global bond sell-off hits Japan’s government debt; pound falls again – business live

title: ABC should be fined up to $350k after Buttrose’s ‘pressure’ on staff to sack Lattouf, federal court hears
summary: In court, barrister Philip Boncardo claims that former ABC chair Lattouf exerted "significant pressure" on Chris Oliver-Taylor. This allegation focuses on Lattouf's influence over Oliver-Taylor's decisions. The case raises concerns about governance and ethical conduct within the organization.

title: ‘I was killed in virtually every film’: how trailblazing Chinese-American star Anna May Wong upended cinema
summary: The BFI is hosting a retrospective honoring Wong's remarkable ability to captivate audiences, despite often being typecast in orientalist roles. The exhibition highlights her groundbreaking moments, including challenging societal norms. It showcases her enduring impact on cinema through her compelling performances.

title: The Courageous review – rebellious mum on the edge will have you sobbing in sympathy
summary: Ophélia Kolb stars in a new Swiss drama that explores complex moral themes, drawing comparisons to the style of the Dardenne brothers. The film presents a realistic portrayal of its characters and their dilemmas. Kolb's performance is highlighted as a key element in this thought-provoking narrative.
